caption.p: (a) Heatmap of up- and down-regulated genes, and those with unchanged expression in SAT and VAT of CD and STD rats as determined by the Rat Fatty Acid Metabolism RT 2 Profiler PCR Array. Data are presented as mean ± SEM (n = 8). Taqman gene expression validation of Slc27a3 in (b) VAT and (c) SAT of CD and STD rats. Data are presented as mean ± SEM (n = 10)
